channel.title: Error_game_js5connect
channel.description: Basically i have a client with 9/10 times i get the above error. however when my friends use the same client to connect to the server they encounter no problems. I was told to open client.java client sided and change the ip to 127.0.0.1 this had no affect and i still had the problem. I was then told to change the ip to 0.0.0.0 this made the client work however it has now stopped working. any ideas?

item.title: Error_game_js5connect
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

Basically i have a client with 9/10 times i get the above error. however when my friends use the same client to connect to the server they encounter no problems. I was told to open client.java client sided and change the ip to 127.0.0.1 this had no affect and i still had the problem. I was then told to change the ip to 0.0.0.0 this made the client work however it has now stopped working. any ideas?
